document_data.mainbody:
Divining Evil is an adventure module set in the Forgotten Realms using the Dungeons & Dragons 5 edition ruleset. It is part of the Plague of Ancients series of adventures published for the D&D Adventurers League. It focuses on Icewind Dale, and is an adventure designed for 1- to 4-level characters.
Characters
Grakal Dawnbreaker • Kaskur Spearsong • Nararhak Treeeye • Ogolai Orcsplitter • Old Goat • Thugeo Goatchaser
Rikuur Hideminder
Creatures
air elemental • air weird • ankheg • chardalyn mephit • elk • giant elk • goliath • manticore • remorhaz • saber-toothed tiger • silver dragon wymling
Events
Everlasting Rime
Location
Region Icewind Dale
Wilderness Wyrmdoom Crag
Magic
Items boots of string and springing • spell scroll of lesser restoration
Potions Potion of healing
Spells cure wounds • divination • greater restoration • identify • lesser restoration • prayer of healing • raise dead • remove curse • revivify • speak with dead • true resurrection
Items
chardalyn arrowhead
* D&D Adventurers League Guildmaster Chris Lindsay
* D&D Adventurers League Wizards Team Brandy Camel, Lea Helotis, Chris Lindsay, Chris Tulach
* D&D Adventurers League Administrator(s) Ma’at Crook, Amy Lynn Dzura, Claire Hoffman, Greg Marks, Alan Patrick, Travis Woodall
* Art Director and Graphic Designer Rich Lescouflair
* Interior Art Chad Wild, Paul Scott Canavan, Sam Keiser, Livia Prima, April Prime
* Playtesters James Bowen, Frank Foulis, Travis Fuller, Wayne Fuller, Gregory Harris, Chris McGovern, Daniel Oliveira, Dave Rosser, James Schweiss, JJ Tin, Marcello Velazquez
